best way to find depends for an app is tto keep running the ./configure and installing what it says it misses
since you want to learn, I won' give you outright answers (and I ask that no one else does :P)
but use apt-cache search <whatever it says you are missing>
I will point you in the right direction
tthere is a difference between giving the answers and giving hints :P
apt-cache search glib and choose the -dev package
it contains the parts of the library needed for compiling from them
if you coded in C or C++ this would be easier to explain :P
